abstract: Flurry, which tracks how people use mobile phone applications, has raised $7 million in new funds from investors.
snippet: Flurry, which tracks how people use mobile phone applications, has raised $7 million in new funds from investors.
lead_paragraph: Flurry, a mobile analytics firm with offices in New York and San Francisco, said Tuesday that it has raised $7 million in a Series B round of financing from venture capital firms InterWest Partners, Draper Fisher Jurvetson, Union Square Ventures and First Round Capital, among others.

headline.main: Fresh Cash for Flurry’s Mobile Analytics

abstract: Google is expanding its cloud-based storage options with new file formats.
snippet: Google is expanding its cloud-based storage options with new file formats.
lead_paragraph: Google is moving closer to offering something like a Web-based disk drive where users can store any file and access it from anywhere.

headline.main: Google Lets Users Store More Files Online

abstract: Google said an attack on it and other services was aimed at Chinese dissidents.
snippet: Google said an attack on it and other services was aimed at Chinese dissidents.
lead_paragraph: In a calm and understated blog post, Google said Tuesday that it had recently come under an unusual cyberattack from China. The Web giant said the attack was very different from previous ones because it was aimed at Chinese dissidents’ Gmail accounts.

headline.main: Google Threatens Pullout from China After Cyberattacks on Dissidents
